response.overview: In the midst of a nasty public breakup of married movie stars, a studio publicist scrambles to put a cap on the escalating situation as the couple's latest film has found it's only print kidnapped by the director.
response.tagline: Hollywood's hottest couple just split up. It'll take more than special effects to reunite them.
response.title: America's Sweethearts

results.name: Eddie Kisses Kiki In A Moment Of Passion
Eddie and Gwen Talk About Their Relationship
